title: Show 274 - *Rosena Allin-Khan - LIVE*
itunes:title: Show 274 - *Rosena Allin-Khan - LIVE*
description:
Rosena Allin-Khan isn't like most politicians. As well as being one of Labour's brightest frontbench talents, she's also an A&E doctor. She served on the frontline throughout the pandemic, before the vaccine and before PPE. Her heroism doesn't stop there. Rosena recently visited Ukraine to help deliver humanitarian aid. She talks about both of these experiences and so much more in this spellbinding interview which was part of the rescheduled Christmas Special. So. have some mulled wine, a mince pie and a full Christmas Dinner and enjoy!

 

Follow Rosena on Twitter: @DrRosena

 

Buy tickets to The Political Party, live at The Duchess Theatre including the next show with ANDREW MARR on Monday 2 May here: https://www.nimaxtheatres.com/shows/the-political-party-with-matt-forde

  

Buy tickets to Matt's brand new stand-up show Clowns To The Left Of Me, Jokers to the Right, touring across the UK: https://www.mattforde.com/2022tour

 

Forthcoming guests at The Political Party include:

 

2 May: Andrew Marr

16 May: Lisa Nandy

30 May: Wes Streeting

13 June: Gary Neville

27 June: David Davis

11 July: Lindsay Hoyle

 

Email the show: politicalpartypodcast@gmail.com

 

Follow Matt on Twitter: @mattforde

 


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
